mapper.insert: insert into WAM_DDL_SEQ (DDL_SEQ_ID, DDL_SEQ_PNM, DDL_SEQ_LNM, DB_SCH_ID, INCBY, STRTWT, MAXVAL, MINVAL, CYC_YN, CACHE_SZ, ORD_YN, NM_RL_TYP_CD, US_TYP_CD, PDM_TBL_PNM, PDM_COL_PNM, L1CD_PNM, L3CD_PNM, GRT_LST, PRC_TYP_CD, PRC_DT, PRC_DBA_ID, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, SCRT_INFO ) values (#{ddlSeqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlSeqPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlSeqLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strtwt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cycYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cacheSz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nmRlTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{l1cdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{l3cdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtLst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prcDbaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scrtInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update WAM_DDL_SEQ
DDL_SEQ_PNM = #{ddlSeqPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_SEQ_LNM = #{ddlSeqLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_SCH_ID = #{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCBY = #{incby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STRTWT = #{strtwt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAXVAL = #{maxval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MINVAL = #{minval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CYC_YN = #{cycYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CACHE_SZ = #{cacheSz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORD_YN = #{ordYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NM_RL_TYP_CD = #{nmRlTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
US_TYP_CD = #{usTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_TBL_PNM = #{pdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_COL_PNM = #{pdmColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
L1CD_PNM = #{l1cdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
L3CD_PNM = #{l3cdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRT_LST = #{grtLst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRC_TYP_CD = #{prcTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRC_DT = #{prcDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRC_DBA_ID = #{prcDbaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCRT_INFO = #{scrtInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DDL_SEQ_ID = #{ddlSeqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAM_DDL_SEQ set DDL_SEQ_PNM = #{ddlSeqPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_SEQ_LNM = #{ddlSeqLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_SCH_ID = #{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCBY = #{incby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STRTWT = #{strtwt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAXVAL = #{maxval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MINVAL = #{minval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CYC_YN = #{cycYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CACHE_SZ = #{cacheSz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORD_YN = #{ordYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NM_RL_TYP_CD = #{nmRlTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, US_TYP_CD = #{usTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_TBL_PNM = #{pdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_COL_PNM = #{pdmColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, L1CD_PNM = #{l1cdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, L3CD_PNM = #{l3cdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRT_LST = #{grtLst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRC_TYP_CD = #{prcTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRC_DT = #{prcDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRC_DBA_ID = #{prcDbaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCRT_INFO = #{scrtInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DDL_SEQ_ID = #{ddlSeqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAM_DDL_SEQ set DDL_SEQ_PNM = #{ddlSeqPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_SEQ_LNM = #{ddlSeqLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_SCH_ID = #{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCBY = #{incby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STRTWT = #{strtwt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAXVAL = #{maxval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MINVAL = #{minval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CYC_YN = #{cycYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CACHE_SZ = #{cacheSz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORD_YN = #{ordYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NM_RL_TYP_CD = #{nmRlTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, US_TYP_CD = #{usTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_TBL_PNM = #{pdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_COL_PNM = #{pdmColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, L1CD_PNM = #{l1cdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, L3CD_PNM = #{l3cdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRT_LST = #{grtLst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRC_TYP_CD = #{prcTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRC_DT = #{prcDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRC_DBA_ID = #{prcDbaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DDL_SEQ_ID = #{ddlSeqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* , DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , S.DB_SCH_PNM , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAH_DDL_SEQ A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON A.DB_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.DDL_SEQ_ID = #{ddlSeqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.* , DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , S.DB_SCH_PNM , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , D.DEPT_NM AS RQST_USER_DEPT , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor
FROM WAH_DDL_SEQ A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON A.DB_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DEPT D ON U1.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
AND A.DDL_SEQ_ID = #{ddlSeqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY A.EXP_DTM DESC, A.STR_DTM DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAH_DDL_SEQ SET
PRC_TYP_CD = #{prcTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
-- PRC_DT = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD'), PRC_DT = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),
PRC_DT = NULL,
PRC_DBA_ID = #{prcDbaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
PRC_DBA_ID = NULL
WHERE DDL_SEQ_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NULLIF(PRC_DT, '') IS NULL --처리완료왼 건은 해제못함 20171214
